attributes.action: Investigate in fast food shops being bilt outside schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Very close to many schools there are fast food shops. This means that after school an huge amount of children go to them every night- as the shops are so close and accesible. This is leading to unhealthy children and could easily be avoided, these shops are too accesible and too close to the schools.
